# Interlude IX: The Skeleton of Regret {.unnumbered}

> "The spine is the narrative of the soul. If you want to change your story, you must first collapse your frame. Become the statue."
> 
> — *The Reverse Maven*

We return to the body. Having explored the mind and the market, we now look at the Somatic Shadow—the physical choreography of the defeated. We will learn to hold our failure in our very bones.
